mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId} FOR UPDATE
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM payments p JOIN memberships m ON p.membership_id = m.membership_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.membership_id = #{membershipId} AND p.payment_type = 'MEMBERSHIP' AND p.status IN ('PENDING', 'PAID') AND m.status = 'ACTIVE' AND m.subscription_end >= CURDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paid_at = #{paidAt}, cancelled_at = #{cancelledAt}, refunded_at = #{refundedAt} WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(month_val, '월') as date, SUM(amount) as revenue FROM ( SELECT YEAR(paid_at) as year_val, MONTH(paid_at) as month_val, amount FROM payments WHERE influencer_id = #{influencerId} AND status = 'PAID' AND cancelled_at IS NULL AND refunded_at IS NULL ) sub GROUP BY year_val, month_val ORDER BY year_val ASC, month_val ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as revenue FROM payments WHERE influencer_id = #{influencerId} AND status = 'PAID' AND cancelled_at IS NULL AND refunded_at IS NULL AND DATE(paid_at) = CURDATE()

SELECT CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT((SELECT MIN(paid_at) FROM payments WHERE influencer_id = #{influencerId} AND status = 'PAID'), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) as date, COALESCE( SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'PAID' THEN amount WHEN status = 'REFUNDED' THEN -amount ELSE 0 END), 0 ) as revenue FROM payments WHERE influencer_id = #{influencerId} AND status IN ('PAID', 'REFUNDED') AND cancelled_at IS NULL
SELECT payment_id FROM payments WHERE status = 'PENDING' AND created_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{expiredMinutes} MINUTE) ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 100
SELECT oi.influencer_id FROM order_items oi WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId} LIMIT 1
